timeline.title: Week 1: Strong Start
timeline.summary: First week of trading with consistent execution across four active trading days. Generated 3.8R ($2,279.6) from 15 trades with disciplined risk management.

details.notes: Excellent start to the challenge with four active trading days. Jan 20 showed strong performance with 5 trades generating $833 (1.39R). Jan 21 was the strongest day with $1,696.2 from 3 trades (2.83R). Jan 22 added $473.6 from 4 trades (0.79R). Jan 23 experienced a drawdown of -$723.2 from 3 trades (-1.21R). Total weekly performance: $2,279.6 (3.8R) across 15 trades. All trades executed within predefined risk parameters. Max drawdown limit: $6,000 (10R).

timeline.title: Challenge Initiated
timeline.summary: New prop firm challenge account opened and activated. Starting balance: $150,000. Max drawdown: $6,000 (1R = $600).
